General.Name: Iqstel Inc
General.Description: iQSTEL Inc. provides telecommunication services as a wholesale carrier of voice, short message service (SMS), and data for other telecom companies. It offers VoIP, SMS, proprietary Internet of Things, and international fiber-optic communication services; international long-distance voice services for telecommunications operators; and submarine fiber optic network capacity for internet, such as 4G and 5G. The company also provides network infrastructure services to the retail end users; international voice termination for carriers, US/Canada inbound / origination, global DIDs and toll-free numbers, private branch exchange for small businesses, and SIP trunking; ItsBchain, a blockchain technology that focus on the telecom sector; financial services to immigrants; mobile number portability application services; electric motorcycles and mid speed cars; and white label solutions. It serves wholesale carrier, government, corporate, enterprise, and small and medium companies in North America, Latin America, and Europe. The company was formerly known as PureSnax International, Inc. and changed its name to iQSTEL Inc. in August 2018. iQSTEL Inc. is based in Coral Gables, Florida.
General.Address: 300 Aragon Avenue, Coral Gables, FL, United States, 33134
